title: Language Mechanics On Stacks And Pointers
description:
Prelude This is the first post in a four part series that will provide an understanding of the mechanics and design behind pointers, stacks, heaps, escape analysis and value/pointer semantics in Go. This post focuses on stacks and pointers.
Index of the four part series:
1) Language Mechanics On Stacks And Pointers
2) Language Mechanics On Escape Analysis
3) Language Mechanics On Memory Profiling
4) Design Philosophy On Data And Semantics
